start.text: Win the battle, win the war.

start_boss.text: The bigger they are, the harder they fall.

retreat.text: Roger that, let's get out of here.
Count me out, I don't get paid enough for this!
I'm out of here, Godspeed to the rest of you.

out_of_missiles.text: Our missiles are depleted, none remain onboard.
Well, just fired the last of my missiles.

need_help.text: Stumbled into a kill box over here, please assist!
Up shit creek without a paddle, please help me!
Not going to last much longer, can I get some backup?
I need a squad over here ASAP!

pursuing.text: Fire, FIRE! Don't let them through!

running.text: We need to back off a little bit.
Helm, break off so we can dissipate flux safely.

hull_90.text: Taking hits, but are OK for now.
My ship is taking damage but so far it remains non-critical.

hull_50.text: That was a nuke! Or worse...

hull_30.text: This rustbucket is coming apart at the seams!
Port side magazine is cooking off!
Come on baby, don't break apart on me yet!
Half the bridge crew just got spaced!

overload.text: They are going to blow out the reactor at this rate!

death.text: My ship has a reactor brea-
Tell my wife and kids I love them.
I didn't think I would die like this...

victory.text: Glorious victory, let us drink to commemorate!
Just be glad that it is over with.
Seems like it wasn't my time yet.

victory_boss.text: Get my medal case! Someone's getting a new one.
I can feel the sweat on my brow.
